Now, code:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int a;
    scanf("%d", &a);
    int first_result = (a == 0) ? 1 : 0;

    // Convert first_result to string
    char first_str[2];
    sprintf(first_str, "%d", first_result);

    // Process second step
    int even0 = 0, even1 = 0, odd0 = 0, odd1 = 0;
    int len_first = strlen(first_str);
    for (int i = 0; i < len_first; i++) {
        if (i % 2 == 0) {
            if (first_str[i] == '0') even0++;
            else if (first_str[i] == '1') even1++;
        } else {
            if (first_str[i] == '0') odd0++;
            else if (first_str[i] == '1') odd1++;
        }
    }
    int total = len_first;
    int option1 = even0 + odd1;
    int option2 = even1 + odd0;
    int second_result = (total - option1) < (total - option2) ? (total - option1) : (total - option2);

    // Convert second_result to string
    char second_str[20];
    sprintf(second_str, "%d", second_result);

    // Process third step
    int freq[256] = {0};
    int len_second = strlen(second_str);
    for (int i = 0; i < len_second; i++) {
        freq[second_str[i]]++;
    }
    int unique = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
        if (freq[i] > 0) unique++;
    }
    if (unique != 2) {
        printf("No\n");
        return 0;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
        if (freq[i] != 0 && freq[i] != 2) {
            printf("No\n");
            return 0;
        }
    }
    printf("Yes\n");

    return 0;
}
